short_summary: Supply, installation and maintenance of security systems
description: The Senate of Canada invites submissions of quotations for the supply, installation and maintenance as set forth in this RFQ. The period of any resulting contract(s) shall be for one (1) year with four (4) one-year option periods. You must bid on all items in the stream(s) you have selected in order for your bid to be valid – see Annex “E” - Price List. Any enquiries regarding this RFQ must be received by e-mail at: Proc-Appr@sen.parl.gc.ca, no later than November 17, 2023 at 11:00 AM EST to the attention of Shirley Chartrand, Senior Procurement Advisor. Bidders should reference as accurately as possible the numbered item of the bid solicitation to which the enquiry relates. Care should be taken by bidders to explain each question in sufficient detail in order to enable the Senate of Canada to provide an accurate answer. Enquiries that are of a proprietary nature must be clearly marked “proprietary” at each relevant item. Items identified as “proprietary” will be treated as such except where the Senate of Canada determines that the enquiry is not of a proprietary nature.

full_summary:
=================================
### **Supply, Installation, and Maintenance of Security Systems**

#### Tender Announcement

**Reference Number:** cb-258-49732376
**Amendment Number:** 7
**Solicitation Number:** RFQ SEN-051 23-24
**Publication Date:** 2023-11-03
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-30T11:00:00 (expired)
**Contracting Entity:** Senate of Canada

#### Service Description

The Senate of Canada invites qualified contractors to submit quotations for the supply, installation, and maintenance of security systems. The contract period will be for one year with four one-year option periods.

#### Key Tender Details

* **Procurement Category:** SRV
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** Canada

#### Tender Requirements

Bidders must submit quotations for all items in the selected stream(s) to be considered valid. A price list is provided in Annex "E".

#### Contact Information

* **Name:** Shirley Chartrand
* **Email:** Proc-Appr@sen.parl.gc.ca
* **Phone:** 613995-8888
* **Address:** 40 Elgin Street, 11th floor, Ottawa, ON K1A 0A4, Canada

#### Important Dates

* **Publication Date:** 2023-11-03
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-30T11:00:00 (expired)

#### Attachments

The following documents are attached to this tender announcement:

* RFQ SEN-051 addendum 1_e_final_nov_08_2023.pdf
* finpro_rfq_sen-051-23-24_security-assessment_final_11032023.pdf
* finproc_rfq-sen-051_add-2_e_final_11232023.pdf

#### Unspsc Codes

* *46151600: Security and control equipment
* *46170000: Security surveillance and detection
* *46171619: Security or access control systems
* *46171623: Home security alarm
* *92120000: Security and personal safety
* *92121700: Security systems services

Note: I reorganized the sections, shortened the text, and used a more formal tone throughout the document. I removed unnecessary information and focused on the essential details of the tender announcement.
